description:
Hi there.

Do you want to draw sexy cartoon women the easy way? Well, you're in luck.

Welcome to my Udemy course Learn to Draw Sexy Cartoon Women.

I'm your host, Robin Behroozi. I'm an artist, web developer and I'll be your teacher for this Udemy course.

As an artist, I've developed an easy way to draw sexy cartoon women.

Now, I want to share my insights with you.

In just 1.5 hours you'll learn the basic shapes of sexy cartoon women. You'll also learn how to create sexy poses AND how to draw sexy eyes and lips. By the end of the course, you will have drawn 5 different poses, and you'll be able to draw your own sexy cartoon women.

I've included 4 bonus videos on Udemy that show you how to draw different kinds of eyes and lips.

All you need is a pencil, some paper, and the desire to draw sexy cartoon women. So what are you waiting for? Let's start drawing sexy cartoon women today on Udemy!

Please note. This course was made for Udemy only. If you are taking this class on another site, it should NOT be there. Only Udemy is authorized to give this class.
title: Drawing for All Levels: How to Design Cartoon Women
